analysis: The documents all concern the designation of individuals to perform the duties of a Secretary or Administrator of a department or agency in the event of absence, illness, resignation, or death of the primary office holders. They establish an order of succession, often specifying exceptions and revoking previous orders. The documents cover various departments and agencies, including War, Interior, Homeland Security, Agriculture, Environmental Protection Agency, Justice, Labor, Commerce and Navy.
title: Departmental Leadership Succession
